column4: [Alsamixer] What does the currently selected mixer "Item" 'Master' mean or designate?
depending upon what you are looking at, it is either signifying which mixer channel you are adjusting the level/gain of, or which input is selected for recording purposes
No, sir. I designated clearly an object: the 'Master'. The Master is a technical term (terminus technicus) in AlsaMixer. Can you tell me what AlsaMixer weans by 'Master'?
